name: shaganplaatjies-theme
description: Custom WordPress theme built with Roots Sage, Tailwind CSS, and Laravel Mix - Optimized for shared hosting deployment
author: Shagan Plaatjies

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run jest
scripts.build:production: npm run lint && npm run jest && npm run production
scripts.build:check: npm run production && echo '✓ Assets compiled successfully'
scripts.deploy:prepare: npm run build:production && echo '✓ Production assets ready - next: commit and deploy via SFTP'
scripts.deploy:verify: test -f dist/css/app.css && test -f dist/js/app.js && test -f mix-manifest.json && echo '✓ All deployment files present' || echo '✗ Missing deployment files'
